name: Calybro
tagline: Calybro is a fitness device which measures and improves the strength and balance of athletes.
body:
### How does look like the device concept.
![Calybro device concept](http://i.imgur.com/5fPmn4o.png)

### What is this device for
* It can be primarily used for legs and abdomen strength exercises.
* Improves running form. Is no way to overstride on it. The user cannot perform the exercise if lands other way than mid-front of the foot.
* Detects eventual unbalances, highly accurate.
* Collects biomechanics data and uploads it to servers and apps.

### The components and their role

* The running pad
![Calybro running pad](http://i.imgur.com/8Aa0LMu.png)
The running pad is made of athletics tracks material, 50x50 cm and 2 cm thick.
There are two horizontal bands and two vertical bands. These are [velostat](https://www.adafruit.com/product/1361) sensors. When touched, these sensors will transmit certain information to the electronic device.  
2 distance sensors are placed at the end of the velostat bands.

* The electronic component
![Calybro - electronic part](blob:http%3A//imgur.com/e34582cf-52b9-4270-a380-f2a454abaf9b)
The electronic component has a display showing various information about the activity. An Arduino board is linked to the velostat bands from the running pad. The Arduino board has a bluetooth module, which will communicate with a mobile application. 


### How to use the fitness device
## Starting/stopping an activity
* Start the mobile application to connect with the device
* Press "Start" on the device's button
* Start the activity
* Press "Stop" on the mobile application when done, or press "Finish" on the fitness device
## Using the running pad
The running pad has a transparent slippery surface. The athletes would wear socks only, to facilitate the sliding motion.
## The fitness activities
Start sliding beginning from the upper velostat band, toward the lower velostat band, trying to touch the bands intersections.
## Display information
When touching the upper bands intersections, the landing sign, denoted with a target mark, will flash green and the accuracy will be updated.  
When releasing the foot from the ground, the take off sign, denoted with a bow, will flash green and its accuracy will be updated.  
The distance ran will be calculated with the help of the distance sensors times steps made.

### The heatmap of muscles involved in the activity
![Calybro - muscles affected](http://i.imgur.com/cWrnCKq.png)
The main activity which can be done is by all means a strength exercise. The effects on aerobic capacity is too low to be used for this purpose.
